thread.title: Ricky
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Ricky

author: Ricky
title: Ricky
text: My wife and I were looking for a day bed. My sisters were out shopping at the Lewisville store and saw a trundle bed and recommended we check it out. We went to the Denton store, and to our amazement, the store not only had the trundle bed (which we purchased), but left us interested in purchasing additional furnishings for our home. And, the knowledge and courtesy of the store representative, James, who helped us was superb. We will definitely be back!
